actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Forest Service to convey certain lands in the Lake Tahoe Basin to the Washoe County School District for use as an elementary school site.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture, upon application, to convey specified property to the Washoe County School District for the construction of an elementary school.Requires that the proceeds from such conveyance be available to the Secretary for the acquisition of environmentally sensitive land in the Lake Tahoe Basin.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Forest Service to convey certain lands in the Lake Tahoe Basin to the Washoe County School District for use as an elementary school site.
